item.title: [DISTRELEC-5140] FE: Alignment to vertical line
item.description:
Requirement
The attributes should be aligned to the vertical line.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please estimate.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5103] Subtotal while checkout is not correct
item.description:
Mac OS X 10.9.4
Safari 7.0.6

Put some articles in the cart, the subtotal is not calculated correctly.
item.summary: Subtotal while checkout is not correct

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
For these products there is a discount of 1.22 eur.
See DISTRELEC-5101 for details

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5101] calculation failure
item.description:
Tested for the vaucher script and I noticed that the calculation is wrong.

non-logged user, 2 parts.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The calculation at the end is correct since in SAP for these products there is a discount of 20%.
This means that the total amount of the discount is 289.0.

1445 - 289 = 1156

The discount is not displayed, this was discussed also here: https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4202?focusedCommentId=578997&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-578997

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5089] DE // Not possible to close now an existing Open Order in checkout
item.description: In case of checkout of an existing open order the button to checkout & close the open order now it doesnt' work
item.summary: DE // Not possible to close now an existing Open Order in checkout

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Jan
as discussed via phone i've added a new field to the CheckOutReviewForm named openOrderCloseDate.
Please use this field as a new form field.
The logic in the backend will be that

  • if this field is empty (or null) the open order will be checked out with the original closingDate
  • if this field contains a date (the today date) than the order will be checked out with this date.

Hi Francesco,

Where you able to test my fix yesterday?

BR Jan

Hi Jan
yes, the fix has worked.
Now everything works fine

Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5067] no suggest box is showing after typing 3 characters
item.description:
exception of the script:
type keyword "USB" into search field
suggest box is appearing after 3 characters. Full keyword should be filled in.

fact:
no suggest box is showing after 3 characters, but after 4.

see also printscreens
item.summary: no suggest box is showing after typing 3 characters

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Works. The issue here is that the FF is very slow and it takes several seconds until the suggest layer is shown.
tested -> OK!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5060] DE // No Attributes in tech view
item.description: No web use attributes are displayed in the tech view.
item.summary: DE // No Attributes in tech view

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
It seems that neither on standard page load nor on ajax view switch any technical attributes are delivered to the frontend. (See printscreen) Raphael Husi could you please look into that or assign it to a backend Engineer?

Thanks, Jan
Should I fix that overlunch time? Probably the fields are missing in the FF config.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4968] Test DE Atos // Open Orders - when I add to an open order, a new Order Number is generated at the end
item.description:
user: andre.hoffmann@distrelec.com
pass: sap@distrelec

In his account he has this order as open order: 1000005094 (see print screen 1)

According to Evenagelos, this should not be an open order avialable today. (it is an Open Order from the past)

Secondly, when I check-out, at the end a new Order Number is generated. (see Print_screen_2)
item.summary: Test DE Atos // Open Orders - when I add to an open order, a new Order Number is generated at the end

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Waiting on this DISTRELEC-5018
Related to DISTRELEC-5018

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4943] Test DE Atos // Open Orders History
item.description:
v3.0.6m

Open Order History is empty, though I created an open order: 1000005085
https://test.a.distrelec.de/my-account/open-orders

account: distrelec.testing+ade1@gmail.com
pass: distrelec
item.summary: Test DE Atos // Open Orders History

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Did you get to this screen? (screenshot)
yes
@Oana: Still an issue? If not, please resolve/close.
A label "Open Orders" would be more precise, as it is not a history but a list of the currently open orders. Closed open orders will become available in the normal order history.

Nabil could you please change the link text from "(de) Open Order History" to "Open Orders"
Thx.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4889] Function and Department not transferred to SAP
item.description: During customer creation and change the Function and Department field are not transferred to SAP
item.summary: Function and Department not transferred to SAP

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Nabil,
Please estimate and start.

Hi,

According to DISTRELEC-3898, there is no one to one mapping with ELFA values. The mapping was fixed already?
fixed

Could you please test?
Thx.

Hello Urs,
Could you please check that?

Hi Florian
I just made a test but I still get no department and function into SAP.
The customer I have created has the number 1241272.
Could you check again, please?

Hi Nabil
If I create a new customer both values are transferred corretly. But if I make an update in the shop both values are not transferred to SAP.
When I make an update in SAP just the function is changed in the shop but not the department.
Could you check this, please?
Many thanks

Hi Nabil
Were you already able to look into this issue?
fixed
